ImpactRiskOpportunityScore.name: ImpactRiskOpportunityScore
ImpactRiskOpportunityScore.description: Represents the score of an impact, risk, or opportunity for an assessment.

ImpactIrremediability.description: A value from 1 through 5 that represents the irremediability of an impact, where 1 indicates the lowest and 5 indicates the highest.

ImpactRiskOpportunityId.description: The impact risk opportunity record associated with the impact risk opportunity score.

ImpactScale.description: A value from 1 through 5 that represents the scale of an impact occurring, where 1 indicates the smallest scale and 5 indicates the largest scale.

ImpactScope.description: A value from 1 through 5 that represents the scope of an impact, where 1 indicates the smallest scope and 5 indicates the largest scope.

ImpactSeverity.description: A value from 1 through 5 that represents the severity of an impact, where 1 indicates the lowest severity and 5 indicates the highest severity.

ImpcRiskOppAssessmentId.description: The impact risk opportunity assessment record associated with the impact risk opportunity score.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Likelihood.description: A value from 1 through 5 that represents the likelihood of a impact, risk, or opportunity occurring, where 1 indicates the lowest probability and 5 indicates the highest probability.

Magnitude.description: A value from 1 through 5 that represents the magnitude of a risk, impact, or opportunity, where 1 indicates the smallest magnitude and 5 indicates the largest magnitude.
